channel.title: Einstein on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Einstein on Partially Attended

item.title: Wittgenstein and Physics, Cross College Oxford one day seminar
item.description: (image via peternijenhuis) Last year I attended a one day seminar on Wittgenstein and Physics. It was held at Cross College Oxford and was the first in a planned series of talks on the history and philosophy of science. It’s been a long time since I’ve done physics seriously, and longer still since I took classes on the history and philosophy of science, so I attended very much in the mode of the interested outsider.
